Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WriteTIFFImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-28 contains a memory leak in WriteTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-28 contains a memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage in coders/ycbcr.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in GetImagePixelCache function in MagickCore/cache.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-20 Q16 x86_64, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function GetImagePixelCache in MagickCore/cache.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted CALS image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-20 Q16 x86_64, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadDCMImage in coders/dcm.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted DCM image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the XMagickCommand function in MagickCore/animate.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-4, there is a memory leak in the XMagickCommand function in MagickCore/animate.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak for a colormap in WriteMPCImage in coders/mpc.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak for a colormap in WriteMPCImage in coders/mpc.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadOneJNGImage function in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-5 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-29 and earlier, a memory leak in the formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c was found.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WriteSGIImage in coders/sgi.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteSGIImage in coders/sgi.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WritePDBImage in coders/pdb.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePDBImage in coders/pdb.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadBGRImage in coders/bgr.c.
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadBGRImage in coders/bgr.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop in the ReadBMPImage function of the coders/bmp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-13 Q16, there is an infinite loop in the ReadBMPImage function of the coders/bmp.c file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted bmp file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WriteMSLImage of coders/msl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: There is a memory leak in the function WriteMSLImage of coders/msl.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-13 Q16, and the function ProcessMSLScript of coders/msl.c in GraphicsMagick before 1.3.31.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop in coders/bmp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In coders/bmp.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.8-16, an input file can result in an infinite loop and hang, with high CPU and memory consumption. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in ReadPATTERNImage in coders/pattern.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16, there are memory leaks in ReadPATTERNImage in coders/pattern.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in ReadRLAImage in coders/rla.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16, there are memory leaks in ReadRLAImage in coders/rla.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dcm.c:ReadDCImage can cause denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16 has memory leaks in the ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/json.c:EncodeImageAttributes could cause crash
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16 has memory leaks in the EncodeImageAttributes function in coders/json.c, as demonstrated by the ReadPSDLayersInternal function in coders/psd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in coders/dcm.c:ReadDCMImage can allow for denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: In the ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.7-23, each redmap, greenmap, and bluemap variable can be overwritten by a new pointer. The previous pointer is lost, which leads to a memory leak. This allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory allocation failure in ReadTIFFImage function in memory.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-23 Q16 does not properly validate the amount of image data in a file, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory allocation failure in the AcquireMagickMemory function in MagickCore/memory.c).

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service (DoS) in IsWEBPImageLossless function in coders/webp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16. The IsWEBPImageLossless function in coders/webp.c allows attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: double free in WriteEPTImage function in coders/ept.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: WriteEPTImage in coders/ept.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-25 Q16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (MagickCore/memory.c double free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-buffer-overflow in ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-26 Q16 does not properly restrict memory allocation, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: excessive iteration in the DecodeLabImage and EncodeLabImage functions in coders/tiff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-26 Q16 has excessive iteration in the DecodeLabImage and EncodeLabImage functions (coders/tiff.c), which results in a hang (tens of minutes) with a tiny PoC file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted tiff file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Heap-based buffer over-read in coders/webp.c:IsWEBPImageLossless()
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-24 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in IsWEBPImageLossless in coders/webp.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in SVGKeyValuePairs of coders/svg.c that leads to denial of service via crafted image file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-36 Q16, there is a memory leak in the function SVGKeyValuePairs of coders/svg.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c leads to denial of service or information disclosure via crafted image file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-36 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or information disclosure via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c in the XWD image parsing component
Vulnerabilities.Description: ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c in the XWD image parsing component of ImageMagick 7.0.8-41 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (divide-by-zero error) by crafting an XWD image file in which the header indicates neither LSB first nor MSB first.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c leading to DoS or information disclosure
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly information disclosure via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNMImage of coders/pnm.c leading to DoS or information disclosure
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-40 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNMImage of coders/pnm.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly information disclosure via a crafted image file. This is related to SetGrayscaleImage in MagickCore/quantize.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: null-pointer dereference in function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c and ReadVIDImage in coders/vid.c causing denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in the function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c and the function ReadVIDImage in coders/vid.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak vulnerability in function WriteDPXImage in coders/dpx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a memory leak vulnerability in the WriteDPXImage function in coders/dpx.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak vulnerability in function ReadPCLImage in coders/pcl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a memory leak in the ReadPCLImage function in coders/pcl.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialised value in function WriteJP2Image in coders/jp2.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the WriteJP2Image function in coders/jp2.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialized value in function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the ReadPANGOImage function in coders/pango.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialized value in functionSyncImageSettings in MagickCore/image.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the SyncImageSettings function in MagickCore/image.c. This is related to AcquireImage in magick/image.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the function ReadCUTImage leading to a crash and DoS
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick before 7.0.8-50 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the function ReadCUTImage in coders/cut.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadPSImage in coders/ps.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick before 7.0.8-50 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadPSImage in coders/ps.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a width of zero is mishandled
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a width of zero is mishandled.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a height of zero is mishandled
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a height of zero is mishandled.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling columns
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling columns.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks in AcquireMagickMemory
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks in AcquireMagickMemory because of an AnnotateImage error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced assignment
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced assignment.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced strncpy and an off-by-one error
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced strncpy and an off-by-one error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of off-by-one errors
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of off-by-one errors.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling rows
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling rows.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow in MagickCore/fourier.c in ComplexImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow in MagickCore/fourier.c in ComplexImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory due to mishandling the NoSuchImage error in CLIListOperatorImages
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of mishandling the NoSuchImage error in CLIListOperatorImages in MagickWand/operation.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of an error in MagickWand/mogrify.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of an error in MagickWand/mogrify.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of a wand/mogrify.c error
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of a wand/mogrify.c error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in MagickCore/fourier.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16, ComplexImages in MagickCore/fourier.c has a heap-based buffer over-read because of incorrect calls to GetCacheViewVirtualPixels.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: division by zero in RemoveDuplicateLayers in MagickCore/layer.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-54 Q16 allows Division by Zero in RemoveDuplicateLayers in MagickCore/layer.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: division by zero in MeanShiftImage in MagickCore/feature.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.x before 7.0.8-41 and 6.x before 6.9.10-41, there is a divide-by-zero vulnerability in the MeanShiftImage function. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: out-of-bounds read in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The XWD image (X Window System window dumping file) parsing component in ImageMagick 7.0.8-41 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash resulting from an out-of-bounds Read) in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c by crafting a corrupted XWD image file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-11472.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Use after free in ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: coders/mat.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by crafting a Matlab image file that is mishandled in ReadImage in MagickCore/constitute.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in magick/xwindow.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in magick/xwindow.c, related to XCreateImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dps.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in coders/dps.c, as demonstrated by XCreateImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dot.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in coders/dot.c, as demonstrated by AcquireMagickMemory in MagickCore/memory.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps2.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-40 has a memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps2.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps3.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 has a memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps3.c, as demonstrated by WritePS3Image.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dot.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 has a memory leak in coders/dot.c, as demonstrated by PingImage in MagickCore/constitute.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in WritePNGImage in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNGImage of coders/png.c, related to Magick_png_write_raw_profile and LocaleNCompare.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak in function DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, some memory leaks exist in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WritePSDChannel function in coders/psd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, a memory leak exists in WritePSDChannel in coders/psd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadSIXELImage function in coders/sixel.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, a memory leak exists in ReadSIXELImage in coders/sixel.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WritePDFImage function in coders/pdf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25 and GraphicsMagick through 1.3.31, several memory leaks exist in WritePDFImage in coders/pdf.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WriteDIBImage function in coders/dib.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, a memory leak exists in WriteDIBImage in coders/dib.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: stack-based buffer overflow in function PopHexPixel in coders/ps.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 Q16, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in the function PopHexPixel of coders/ps.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or code execution via a crafted image file.

A design flaw in image processing software that modifies JPEG images might not modify the original EXIF thumbnail, which could lead to an information leak of potentially sensitive visual information that had been removed from the main JPEG image.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: off-by-one read in formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An off-by-one read vulnerability was discovered in ImageMagick before version 7.0.7-28 in the formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c. A local attacker may use this flaw to read beyond the end of the buffer or to crash the program.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: CPU exhaustion vulnerability in function ReadDDSInfo in coders/dds.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a CPU exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadDDSInfo in coders/dds.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak vulnerability in ReadXWDImage function in coders/xwd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadXWDImage function in coders\xwd.c in ImageMagick 7.0.5-6 has a memory leak vulnerability that can cause memory exhaustion via a crafted length (number of color-map entries) field in the header of an XWD file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Infinite loop in ReadPESImage function in coders/pes.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadPESImage function in coders\pes.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has an infinite loop vulnerability that can cause CPU exhaustion via a crafted PES file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Endless loop in ReadTXTImage function in coders/txt.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadTXTImage function in coders/txt.c in ImageMagick through 6.9.9-0 and 7.x through 7.0.6-1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted file, because the end-of-file condition is not considered.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: integer signedness error in ReadDCMImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadDCMImage function in coders\dcm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has an integer signedness error leading to excessive memory consumption via a crafted DCM file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: GraphicsMagick, ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadMPCImage in coders/mpc.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadMPCImage in coders/mpc.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadPCXImage in coders/pcx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadPCXImage in coders/pcx.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadSUNImage function in coders/sun.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadSUNImage in coders/sun.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in the function ReadPSDImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadPSDImage in coders/psd.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadOneJNGImage function in coders\png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory exhaustion vulnerability in ReadOneJNGImage in coders\png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Resource exhaustion in the function ReadPDBImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a CPU exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadPDBImage in coders/pdb.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadOneLayer function in coders/xcf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadOneLayer function in coders/xcf.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadVIFFImage function in coders/viff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadVIFFImage function in coders/viff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted VIFF file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in ReadBMPImage function in coders/bmp.c in ImageMagick
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadBMPImage function in coders/bmp.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted BMP file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Resource exhaustion in WritePixelCachePixels function in coders/xcf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The WritePixelCachePixels function in ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Improper input validadion in load_level function in coders/xcf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-8, the load_level function in coders/xcf.c lacks offset validation, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (load_tile memory exhaustion) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadWEBPImage function in coders/webp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-5 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadWEBPImage in coders/webp.c because memory is not freed in certain error cases, as demonstrated by VP8 errors.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Lack of an EOF check in ReadPSImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In coders/ps.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16, a DoS in ReadPSImage() due to lack of an EOF (End of File) check might cause huge CPU consumption. When a crafted PSD file, which claims a large "extent" field in the header but does not contain sufficient backing data, is provided, the loop over "length" would consume huge CPU resources, since there is no EOF check inside the loop.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Lack of EOF check in the ReadPSDLayersInternal() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In coders/psd.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16, a DoS in ReadPSDLayersInternal() due to lack of an EOF (End of File) check might cause huge CPU consumption. When a crafted PSD file, which claims a large "length" field in the header but does not contain sufficient backing data, is provided, the loop over "length" would consume huge CPU resources, since there is no EOF check inside the loop.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Lack of EOF check in the ReadXBMImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In coders/xbm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 Q16, a DoS in ReadXBMImage() due to lack of an EOF (End of File) check might cause huge CPU consumption. When a crafted XBM file, which claims large rows and columns fields in the header but does not contain sufficient backing data, is provided, the loop over the rows would consume huge CPU resources, since there is no EOF check inside the loop.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the PersistPixelCache function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function PersistPixelCache in magick/cache.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption in ReadMPCImage in coders/mpc.c) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Infinite loop in the ReadWPGImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 has a large loop vulnerability in ReadWPGImage in coders/wpg.c, causing CPU exhaustion via a crafted wpg image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in the ReadSUNImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 has a memory exhaustion issue in ReadSUNImage in coders/sun.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the TIFFIgnoreTags function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in TIFFIgnoreTags in coders/tiff.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the PostscriptDelegateMessage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the function PostscriptDelegateMessage in coders/ps.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the sixel_output_create function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the function sixel_output_create in coders/sixel.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the sixel_decode function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the function sixel_decode in coders/sixel.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadVIPSImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-4 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadVIPSImage in coders/vips.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption in ResizeMagickMemory in MagickCore/memory.c) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-2 contains a memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage in coders/ycbcr.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Infinite loop in ReadPSDChannelZip function in coders/psd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, an infinite loop vulnerability was found in the function ReadPSDChannelZip in coders/psd.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU exhaustion) via a crafted psd image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Resource exhaustion in ExtractPostscript function in coders/wpg.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a large loop vulnerability was found in the function ExtractPostscript in coders/wpg.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU exhaustion) via a crafted wpg image file that triggers a ReadWPGImage call.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service in the function ReadOnePNGImage in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16, a vulnerability was found in the function ReadOnePNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (ReadOneMNGImage large loop) via a crafted mng image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory exhaustion in the function ReadTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c, which allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop in ReadMIFFImage function in coders/miff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16 x86_64 2017-12-22, an infinite loop vulnerability was found in the function ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU exhaustion) via a crafted MIFF image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop ReadTXTImage  in function in coders/txt.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16 x86_64 2017-12-22, an infinite loop vulnerability was found in the function ReadTXTImage in coders/txt.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU exhaustion) via a crafted image file that is mishandled in a GetImageIndexInList call.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: CPU Exhaustion via crafted input file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-11 Q16, a tiny input file 0x50 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x4c 0x36 0x38 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x36 0x1f 0x35 0x50 0x00 can result in a hang of several minutes during which CPU and memory resources are consumed until ultimately an attempted large memory allocation fails. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service in cineon parsing component
Vulnerabilities.Description: The cineon parsing component in ImageMagick 7.0.8-26 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (uncontrolled resource consumption) by crafting a Cineon image with an incorrect claimed image size. This occurs because ReadCINImage in coders/cin.c lacks a check for insufficient image data in a file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow in WriteSGIImage in coders/sgi.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function WriteSGIImage of coders/sgi.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: GraphicsMagick/ImageMagick: multiple crash or DoS issues
Vulnerabilities.Description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in GraphicsMagick before 1.2.4 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash, infinite loop, or memory consumption) via (a) unspecified vectors in the (1) AVI, (2) AVS, (3) DCM, (4) EPT, (5) FITS, (6) MTV, (7) PALM, (8) RLA, and (9) TGA decoder readers; and (b) the GetImageCharacteristics function in magick/image.c, as reachable from a crafted (10) PNG, (11) JPEG, (12) BMP, or (13) TIFF file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Heap-buffer overflow in IsPixelMonochrome
Vulnerabilities.Description: The IsPixelMonochrome function in MagickCore/pixel-accessor.h in ImageMagick 7.0.3.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and crash) via a crafted file.  NOTE: the vendor says "This is a Q64 issue and we do not support Q64."

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: NULL pointer dereference in MagickCore component can lead to a denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 and older version are vulnerable to null pointer dereference in the MagickCore component and might lead to denial of service

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WriteHISTOGRAMImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the WriteHISTOGRAMImage() function in coders/histogram.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WriteMPCImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the WriteMPCImage() function in coders/mpc.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the lite_font_map() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the lite_font_map() function in coders/wmf.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WriteJP2Image() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the WriteJP2Image() function in coders/jp2.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Floating point exception in the WritePALMImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Floating Point Exception (FPE) in the WritePALMImage() function in coders/palm.c, related to an incorrect bits-per-pixel calculation.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadOnePNGImage() function
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the ReadOnePNGImage() function in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory-Leak in ReadMATImage() coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the ReadMATImage() function in coders/mat.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leaks in ReadMATImage function involving the quantum_info and clone_info data structures
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadMATImage function in coders/mat.c in ImageMagick through 6.9.9-3 and 7.x through 7.0.6-3 has memory leaks involving the quantum_info and clone_info data structures.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WritePICONImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The WritePICONImage function in coders/xpm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadMAGICKImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadMAGICKImage function in coders/magick.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WritePICONImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The WritePICONImage function in coders/xpm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file that is mishandled in an OpenPixelCache call.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WritePICONImage function via mishandled AcquireSemaphoreInfo call
Vulnerabilities.Description: The WritePICONImage function in coders/xpm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file that is mishandled in an AcquireSemaphoreInfo call.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leaks in the parse8BIMW and format8BIM functions in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-5 has memory leaks in the parse8BIMW and format8BIM functions in coders/meta.c, related to the WriteImage function in MagickCore/constitute.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: GraphicsMagick, ImageMagick: Mermory leak in ProcessMSLScript coders/msl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ProcessMSLScript function in coders/msl.c in ImageMagick before 6.9.9-5 and 7.x before 7.0.6-5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file, related to the WriteMSLImage function.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadWMFImage in coders/wmf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadWMFImage in coders/wmf.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service in CloneDrawInfo in draw.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadPESImage function in coders/pes.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadPESImage in coders/pes.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service, related to ResizeMagickMemory in memory.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadMATImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadOneJNGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadMVGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-2, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMVGImage in coders/mvg.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service, related to the function ReadSVGImage in svg.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Resource exhaustion in ReadPWPImage function in coders\pwp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a large loop vulnerability in the ReadPWPImage function in coders\pwp.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadOneJNGImage function in coders\png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadOneJNGImage in coders\png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadMPCImage function in coders/mpc.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadMPCImage in coders\mpc.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadDCMImage in coders\dcm.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadPICTImage function in coders/pict.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadPICTImage function in coders/pict.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WritePDFImage function in coders/pdf.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePDFImage in coders/pdf.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WriteMAPImage function in coders/map.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteMAPImage in coders/map.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WritePALMImage function in coders/palm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePALMImage in coders/palm.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak vulnerability in WritePICTImage function in coders/pict.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePICTImage in coders/pict.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadMATImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadMATImage in coders\mat.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function WritePCXImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function WriteCALSImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteCALSImage in coders/cals.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Assertion failure in the function DestroyImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, missing validation was found in coders/mat.c, leading to an assertion failure in the function DestroyImage in MagickCore/image.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Invalid free in the function RelinquishMagickMemory
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a missing NULL assignment was found in coders/png.c, leading to an invalid free in the function RelinquishMagickMemory in MagickCore/memory.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadMATImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadOneMNGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadOneMNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a missing check for multidimensional data was found in coders/mat.c, leading to a memory leak in the function ReadImage in MagickCore/constitute.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the function ReadOneJNGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory exhaustion in function ReadTIFFImage causing denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function ReadTIFFImage, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory exhaustion in function format8BIM causing denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory exhaustion vulnerability was found in the function format8BIM, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WritePCXImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WriteOneJNGImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function WriteOneJNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (WriteJNGImage memory consumption) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadMATImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-5, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the formatIPTC function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-6, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function formatIPTC in coders/meta.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (WriteMETAImage memory consumption) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadMIFFImage function in coders/miff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-8, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption in NewLinkedList in MagickCore/linked-list.c) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadOnePNGImage function in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.9-4 and 7.x before 7.0.6-4, a crafted file could trigger a memory leak in ReadOnePNGImage in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Improper validation of short files in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.9-0 and 7.x before 7.0.6-1, a crafted PNG file could trigger a crash because there was an insufficient check for short files.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Improper input validation in ReadJP2Image function in coders/jp2.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.8-8 and 7.x before 7.0.5-9, the ReadJP2Image function in coders/jp2.c does not properly validate the channel geometry, leading to a crash.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadMATImage function in coders/mat.c.
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.8-5 and 7.x before 7.0.5-6, there is a memory leak in the ReadMATImage function in coders/mat.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Missing NULL check in the ReadMATImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.9-3 and 7.x before 7.0.6-3, there is a missing NULL check in the ReadMATImage function in coders/mat.c, leading to a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit) in the DestroyImageInfo function in MagickCore/image.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in IdentifyImage function in MagickCore/identify.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: Null Pointer Dereference in the IdentifyImage function in MagickCore/identify.c in ImageMagick through 7.0.6-10 allows an attacker to perform denial of service by sending a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in ReadCUTImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-10, a NULL Pointer Dereference issue is present in the ReadCUTImage function in coders/cut.c that could allow an attacker to cause a Denial of Service (in the QueueAuthenticPixelCacheNexus function within the MagickCore/cache.c file) by submitting a malformed image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Excessive memory allocation in ReadWEBPImage function in coders/webp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ReadWEBPImage in coders/webp.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-5 has an issue where memory allocation is excessive because it depends only on a length field in a header.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick, GraphicsMagick: Memory leak in WriteMSLImage function in coders/msl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-2 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteMSLImage in coders/msl.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Integer overflow in the function ReadTXTImage()
Vulnerabilities.Description: In the function ReadTXTImage() in coders/txt.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-10, an integer overflow might occur for the addition operation "GetQuantumRange(depth)+1" when "depth" is large, producing a smaller value than expected. As a result, an infinite loop would occur for a crafted TXT file that claims a very large "max_value" value.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Division by zero in the GetPixelCacheTileSize function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-8 Q16 mishandles EOF checks in ReadMPCImage in coders/mpc.c, leading to division by zero in GetPixelCacheTileSize in MagickCore/cache.c, allowing remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadMPCImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMPCImage in coders/mpc.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadMATImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory exhaustion in the ReadWPGImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 has a memory exhaustion vulnerability in ReadWPGImage in coders/wpg.c via a crafted wpg image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadXCFImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadXCFImage in coders/xcf.c via a crafted xcf image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the GetVirtualPixels function
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, the PersistPixelCache function in magick/cache.c mishandles the pixel cache nexus, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference in the function GetVirtualPixels in MagickCore/cache.c) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Null pointer dereference in DrawGetStrokeDashArray function in wand/drawing-wand.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: DrawGetStrokeDashArray in wand/drawing-wand.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 mishandles certain NULL arrays, which allows attackers to perform Denial of Service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash in AcquireQuantumMemory within MagickCore/memory.c) by providing a crafted Image File as input.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadMATImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-6 has a memory leak in ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in the AcquireResampleFilterThreadSet function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The AcquireResampleFilterThreadSet function in magick/resample-private.h in ImageMagick 7.0.7-4 mishandles failed memory allocation, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL Pointer Dereference in DistortImage in MagickCore/distort.c, and application crash) via unspecified vectors.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Infinite loop in the ReadCAPTIONImage function
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadCAPTIONImage function in coders/caption.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted font file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in PDFDelegateMessage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in PDFDelegateMessage in coders/pdf.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in ReadEnhMetaFile
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in ReadEnhMetaFile in coders/emf.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: NULL pointer dereference in ReadOneMNGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-0 Q16 has a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in ReadOneMNGImage in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadYUVImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-2 contains a memory leak in ReadYUVImage in coders/yuv.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadSGIImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-2 has a memory leak in ReadSGIImage in coders/sgi.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadOneJNGImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-2 has a memory leak in ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Conditional statement depends on unitialized value
Vulnerabilities.Description: ReadPSDImage in coders/psd.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file, related to "Conditional jump or move depends on uninitialised value(s)."

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadXPMImage function in coders/xpm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadXPMImage in coders/xpm.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted xpm image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer over-read in WriteWEBPImage in coders/webp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16 x86_64 2017-12-21, there is a stack-based buffer over-read in WriteWEBPImage in coders/webp.c, related to a WEBP_DECODER_ABI_VERSION check.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted MAT image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in function ReadXPMImage in coders/xpm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadXPMImage in coders/xpm.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted XPM image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the function ReadPGXImage in coders/pgx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadPGXImage in coders/pgx.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PGX image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in function WriteOnePNGImage in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function WriteOnePNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PNG image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the function ReadPICTImage in coders/pict.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadPICTImage in coders/pict.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PICT image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the function ReadPSDChannelZip in coders/psd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadPSDChannelZip in coders/psd.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted psd image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the function GetImagePixelCache
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-16 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function GetImagePixelCache in magick/cache.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted MNG image file that is processed by ReadOneMNGImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick:  memory leaks in coders/msl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16 x86_64 has memory leaks in coders/msl.c, related to MSLPopImage and ProcessMSLScript, and associated with mishandling of MSLPushImage calls.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in ReadPWPImage in coders/pwp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16, there is a Memory Leak in ReadPWPImage in coders/pwp.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in MontageImageCommand function in MagickWand/montage.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-12 Q16, there are memory leaks in MontageImageCommand in MagickWand/montage.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-1 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-10 Q16, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c, which allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadPCDImage function in coders/pcd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 7.0.7. A memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadPCDImage in coders/pcd.c, which allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: assertion failure in MogrifyImageList function in MagickWand/mogrify.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 7.0.7. The MogrifyImageList function in MagickWand/mogrify.c allows attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit in ReplaceImageInList) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WriteGIFImage function in coders/gif.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 7.0.7. A memory leak vulnerability was found in the function WriteGIFImage in coders/gif.c, which allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: File descriptor leak in libmagickcore
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 6.9.7. A specially crafted webp file could lead to a file-descriptor leak in libmagickcore (thus, a DoS).

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory allocation failure in AcquireMagickMemory (incomplete fix for  CVE-2016-8866)
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadPCXImage function in coders/pcx.c in ImageMagick 7.0.4.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (attempted large memory allocation and application crash) via a crafted file. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-8862 and CVE-2016-8866.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Assertion failure in ResetImageProfileIterator
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.5-8 Q16, an assertion failure was found in the function ResetImageProfileIterator, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Infinite loop in coders/png.c:ReadOneMNGImage() allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted MNG file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-28, there is an infinite loop in the ReadOneMNGImage function of the coders/png.c file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted mng file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in WriteTIFFImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-28 contains a memory leak in WriteTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick version 7.0.7-28 contains a memory leak in ReadYCBCRImage in coders/ycbcr.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in GetImagePixelCache function in MagickCore/cache.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-20 Q16 x86_64, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function GetImagePixelCache in MagickCore/cache.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted CALS image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-20 Q16 x86_64, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadDCMImage in coders/dcm.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted DCM image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in the XMagickCommand function in MagickCore/animate.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-4, there is a memory leak in the XMagickCommand function in MagickCore/animate.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak for a colormap in WriteMPCImage in coders/mpc.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak for a colormap in WriteMPCImage in coders/mpc.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadOneJNGImage function in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-5 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-29 and earlier, a memory leak in the formatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c was found.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WriteSGIImage in coders/sgi.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WriteSGIImage in coders/sgi.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WritePDBImage in coders/pdb.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePDBImage in coders/pdb.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in ReadBGRImage in coders/bgr.c.
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadBGRImage in coders/bgr.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-28 has a memory leak vulnerability in WritePCXImage in coders/pcx.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop in the ReadBMPImage function of the coders/bmp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-13 Q16, there is an infinite loop in the ReadBMPImage function of the coders/bmp.c file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted bmp file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in WriteMSLImage of coders/msl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: There is a memory leak in the function WriteMSLImage of coders/msl.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-13 Q16, and the function ProcessMSLScript of coders/msl.c in GraphicsMagick before 1.3.31.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: infinite loop in coders/bmp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In coders/bmp.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.8-16, an input file can result in an infinite loop and hang, with high CPU and memory consumption. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in ReadPATTERNImage in coders/pattern.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16, there are memory leaks in ReadPATTERNImage in coders/pattern.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory Leak in ReadRLAImage in coders/rla.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-17 Q16, there are memory leaks in ReadRLAImage in coders/rla.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dcm.c:ReadDCImage can cause denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16 has memory leaks in the ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/json.c:EncodeImageAttributes could cause crash
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16 has memory leaks in the EncodeImageAttributes function in coders/json.c, as demonstrated by the ReadPSDLayersInternal function in coders/psd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in coders/dcm.c:ReadDCMImage can allow for denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: In the ReadDCMImage function in coders/dcm.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.7-23, each redmap, greenmap, and bluemap variable can be overwritten by a new pointer. The previous pointer is lost, which leads to a memory leak. This allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory allocation failure in ReadTIFFImage function in memory.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-23 Q16 does not properly validate the amount of image data in a file, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory allocation failure in the AcquireMagickMemory function in MagickCore/memory.c).

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service (DoS) in IsWEBPImageLossless function in coders/webp.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in ImageMagick 7.0.7-22 Q16. The IsWEBPImageLossless function in coders/webp.c allows attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation) via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: double free in WriteEPTImage function in coders/ept.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: WriteEPTImage in coders/ept.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-25 Q16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (MagickCore/memory.c double free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-buffer-overflow in ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-26 Q16 does not properly restrict memory allocation, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: excessive iteration in the DecodeLabImage and EncodeLabImage functions in coders/tiff.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.7-26 Q16 has excessive iteration in the DecodeLabImage and EncodeLabImage functions (coders/tiff.c), which results in a hang (tens of minutes) with a tiny PoC file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted tiff file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Heap-based buffer over-read in coders/webp.c:IsWEBPImageLossless()
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.7-24 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in IsWEBPImageLossless in coders/webp.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in SVGKeyValuePairs of coders/svg.c that leads to denial of service via crafted image file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-36 Q16, there is a memory leak in the function SVGKeyValuePairs of coders/svg.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c leads to denial of service or information disclosure via crafted image file
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-36 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or information disclosure via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: denial of service in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c in the XWD image parsing component
Vulnerabilities.Description: ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c in the XWD image parsing component of ImageMagick 7.0.8-41 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (divide-by-zero error) by crafting an XWD image file in which the header indicates neither LSB first nor MSB first.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c leading to DoS or information disclosure
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WriteTIFFImage of coders/tiff.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly information disclosure via a crafted image file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNMImage of coders/pnm.c leading to DoS or information disclosure
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-40 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNMImage of coders/pnm.c, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly information disclosure via a crafted image file. This is related to SetGrayscaleImage in MagickCore/quantize.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: null-pointer dereference in function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c and ReadVIDImage in coders/vid.c causing denial of service
Vulnerabilities.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in the function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c and the function ReadVIDImage in coders/vid.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak vulnerability in function WriteDPXImage in coders/dpx.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a memory leak vulnerability in the WriteDPXImage function in coders/dpx.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak vulnerability in function ReadPCLImage in coders/pcl.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a memory leak in the ReadPCLImage function in coders/pcl.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialised value in function WriteJP2Image in coders/jp2.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the WriteJP2Image function in coders/jp2.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialized value in function ReadPANGOImage in coders/pango.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the ReadPANGOImage function in coders/pango.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: use of uninitialized value in functionSyncImageSettings in MagickCore/image.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-34 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the SyncImageSettings function in MagickCore/image.c. This is related to AcquireImage in magick/image.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the function ReadCUTImage leading to a crash and DoS
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick before 7.0.8-50 has a "use of uninitialized value" vulnerability in the function ReadCUTImage in coders/cut.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadPSImage in coders/ps.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick before 7.0.8-50 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadPSImage in coders/ps.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a width of zero is mishandled
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a width of zero is mishandled.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a height of zero is mishandled
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer over-read at MagickCore/threshold.c in AdaptiveThresholdImage because a height of zero is mishandled.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling columns
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling columns.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks in AcquireMagickMemory
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks in AcquireMagickMemory because of an AnnotateImage error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced assignment
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced assignment.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced strncpy and an off-by-one error
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of a misplaced strncpy and an off-by-one error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of off-by-one errors
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a stack-based buffer overflow at coders/pnm.c in WritePNMImage because of off-by-one errors.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling rows
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow at MagickCore/statistic.c in EvaluateImages because of mishandling rows.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer overflow in MagickCore/fourier.c in ComplexImage
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow in MagickCore/fourier.c in ComplexImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory due to mishandling the NoSuchImage error in CLIListOperatorImages
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of mishandling the NoSuchImage error in CLIListOperatorImages in MagickWand/operation.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of an error in MagickWand/mogrify.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of an error in MagickWand/mogrify.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of a wand/mogrify.c error
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has memory leaks at AcquireMagickMemory because of a wand/mogrify.c error.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in MagickCore/fourier.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16, ComplexImages in MagickCore/fourier.c has a heap-based buffer over-read because of incorrect calls to GetCacheViewVirtualPixels.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: division by zero in RemoveDuplicateLayers in MagickCore/layer.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-54 Q16 allows Division by Zero in RemoveDuplicateLayers in MagickCore/layer.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: division by zero in MeanShiftImage in MagickCore/feature.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.x before 7.0.8-41 and 6.x before 6.9.10-41, there is a divide-by-zero vulnerability in the MeanShiftImage function. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a crafted file.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: out-of-bounds read in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: The XWD image (X Window System window dumping file) parsing component in ImageMagick 7.0.8-41 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash resulting from an out-of-bounds Read) in ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c by crafting a corrupted XWD image file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-11472.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Use after free in ReadMATImage in coders/mat.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: coders/mat.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by crafting a Matlab image file that is mishandled in ReadImage in MagickCore/constitute.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in magick/xwindow.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in magick/xwindow.c, related to XCreateImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dps.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in coders/dps.c, as demonstrated by XCreateImage.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dot.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-35 has a memory leak in coders/dot.c, as demonstrated by AcquireMagickMemory in MagickCore/memory.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps2.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-40 has a memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps2.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps3.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 has a memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps3.c, as demonstrated by WritePS3Image.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: memory leak in coders/dot.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 has a memory leak in coders/dot.c, as demonstrated by PingImage in MagickCore/constitute.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: heap-based buffer over-read in WritePNGImage in coders/png.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function WritePNGImage of coders/png.c, related to Magick_png_write_raw_profile and LocaleNCompare.

Vulnerabilities.Title: imagemagick: memory leak in function DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, some memory leaks exist in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the WritePSDChannel function in coders/psd.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, a memory leak exists in WritePSDChannel in coders/psd.c.

Vulnerabilities.Title: ImageMagick: Memory leak in the ReadSIXELImage function in coders/sixel.c
Vulnerabilities.Description: In ImageMagick before 7.0.8-25, a memory leak exists in ReadSIXELImage in coders/sixel.c.
